english: Here are your first steps to get started:
1. Go to $SETTINGS and set up your user information. (This is important so we know who collected the data we receive.)
2. Click on $DATA_ENTRY and start collecting data. (You don't need an internet connection. The data is stored locally on your phone.)
3. When you have an internet connection, come back and go to $UPLOAD. Then click on the Upload button to send your collected data to us.
Don't forget: You have one data item that has not yet been uploaded.
Don't forget: You have $COUNT data items that have not yet been uploaded.
Email (so we can get in touch)
The token is used for signing data entries. You can get one from the Love The Oceans staff.
You have no data waiting to be uploaded.
The following data has not yet been uploaded. (Click on the logo to open it.)
The following entries are unsigned and will not be uploaded unless you sign them. (Click on the logo to open it.)
Do you really want to delete all unsigned data?
You will lose all data that you collected but did not sign.
Not available yet, but you'll be able to log this soon.
You saw humpback whales? So lucky!
